login.NAME: login
login.DESCRIPTION: Log in with your Riot account
login.FAILED: Failed to log in, please try again

logout.NAME: logout
logout.DESCRIPTION: Log out and delete your account from database
logout.FAILED: Failed to log out, please try again

store.NAME: store
store.DESCRIPTION: Shows your daily store for your accounts

point.NAME: point
point.DESCRIPTION: View your remaining Valorant and Radiant Points (VP/RP)

nightmarket.NAME: nightmarket
nightmarket.DESCRIPTION: Show skin offers on the Night Market

notify_add.NAME: add
notify_add.DESCRIPTION: Set a notification for when a specific skin is available in your store

DESCRIBE.skin: The name of the skin you want to be notified of

notify_add.SUCCESS: Successfully set a notififcation for the {emoji} **{skin}**
notify_add.SKIN_ALREADY_IN_LIST: {emoji} **{skin}** is already added to your notification list
notify_add.REMOVED_NOTIFY: **{skin}** has been removed from your notification list

notify_list.NAME: list
notify_list.DESCRIPTION: View skins you have set a notification for
notify_list.TITLE: Your Notification List
notify_list.REMOVE_NOTIFY: Click the button to remove from notification list

notify_mode.NAME: mode

DESCRIBE.mode: The mode you want to change to

notify_mode.SUCCESS: Successfully changed your notification mode to **{mode}**

notify_test.NAME: test
notify_test.NOTIFY_TURN_OFF: You've not turned on notification mode
notify_test.BOT_MISSING_PERM:
**I don't have permission to send notifications in this channel.** 
Please check the permissions so that I can `View channel`, `Send messages`, `Embed links` and `Use external emoji` in this channel. Afterwards, try `/notify test` again.
notify_test.FAILED_SEND_NOTIFY: Failed to send notification, please try again
notify_test.PLEASE_ALLOW_DM_MESSAGE: Please allow DM messages from server members in your privacy settings

notify_send.RESPONSE_SPECIFIED:
{emoji} **{name}** is in your daily store.
Leaves {duration}

DESCRIBE.channel: Select the channel you want to be notified in.

DESCRIBE.bundle: The name of the bundle you want to inspect.

debug.NAME: debug
debug.DESCRIPTION: The debug command for the bot

DESCRIBE.bug: The bug you want to fix.

cookies.NAME: cookies
cookies.DESCRIPTION: Log into your Riot account with a browser cookie

AUTH.INVALID_PASSWORD: Your username or password may be incorrect.
AUTH.RATELIMIT: Please wait a few minutes and try again.
AUTH.NO_NAME_TAG: This user hasn't created a name or tagline yet.
AUTH.REGION_NOT_FOUND: An unknown error occurred, please `/login` again.
AUTH.2FA_INVALID_CODE: Code is invalid. Please use `/login` again.
AUTH.TEMP_LOGIN_NOT_SUPPORT_2FA: 2FA is unsupported, please use `/cookies` to log in.

DATABASE.NOT_LOGIN: You're not registered., please `/login` to register.
DATABASE.LOGIN_ERROR: Failed to log in, please try again.
DATABASE.LOGOUT_ERROR: I can't log you out if you're not registered.
DATABASE.LOGOUT_EXCEPT: An error occurred while logging out.

SETUP_EMOJI.MISSING_PERM: I don't have permission to create emojis.
SETUP_EMOJI.FAILED_CREATE_EMOJI: I couldn't create emojis, please try again.
